jcr:root.confirmTitle: Thanks, one of our experts will be in touch.
jcr:root.confirmMessage: Your call is scheduled on {date} at {time} EST.
jcr:root.bestTimeToCall: When is the best time to call you?
jcr:root.confirmCancelTitle: Are you sure you want to cancel?
jcr:root.cancelConfirmedTitle: Your call has been cancelled for {date} at {time} EST.

jcr:root.calendarEventDescription: You will receive a call from one of our experts.
jcr:root.notfoundTitle: We were not able to find a scheduled call at that time and date.
jcr:root.notfoundMessage: Would you like to schedule one?
